item.description:
BEE SURE TO ASK THE HOSTESS TO POINT YOU IN OUR GROUP'S DIRECTION WHEN YOU GET THE THE BEEHIVE.

Your Assistant Organizer, will be there wearing a name tag so you can identify her.




AGE RANGE:
The age range of attendees will vary. The approximate age range of men and women based on past similar events is:
MEN - 25-45
WOMEN - 25-45


IMPORTANT!!!!!!
RSVP is REQUIRED for this event for both men and women. No exceptions. $10 without RSVP. Please RSVP here on thi9s Meetup page AND here:http://bostonmoxieint...

DRESS CODE
Absolutely NO JEANS, NO SNEAKERS, NO ACTIVE WEAR.

THINGS TO KNOW:
*This event is open to all!
*Dress code is upscale trendy - Please try to dress to impress - ABSOLUTELY NO JEANS/SNEAKERS
*Ethnically diverse crowd of professionals
*We'll be there from 7-9pm
*Please try to arrive between 7:00 and 7:30pm
*Cocktails will range from $8-$12


TIPS TO HAVE A GREAT TIME:
*Please adhere to the dress code.
*Large scale events like this are best for people who are outgoing and enjoy mingling. If you're not comfortable in large crowds, then this might not be the best event for you.
*Arrive between 7:00 & 7:30pm. Please do not arrive at the venue earlier than 7:00pm.
*Please DO NOT bring large bags, knapsacks or other large items to this event.



CO-SPONSORED BY:
Boston Social Networking
The Boston Social/Professional Networking Meetup Group

group.name: Boston New In Town Meetup Group

item.name: Networking Happy Hour at The Beehive!
